name: Actual Budget
short_description: Self-hosted personal finance app with powerful budgeting and tracking features.
description: Actual Budget is a fast, privacy-focused personal finance manager you host yourself. It uses a local-first sync engine so your data stays on your devices. Features include envelope budgeting, transaction imports, reports, and goal tracking â€” all without subscriptions or cloud lock-in.
usecases: Track monthly household spending and stay on top of budgets across multiple categories.
Import bank transactions and reconcile accounts without sharing data with third-party services.
